snippet.title: Forest Grove - Narrative Trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1491390/Forest_Grove/ Wishlist Now On Steam!

Zooey Kunstmatigaard has gone missing. Her parents are deceased and their vast fortune is now controlled by Zooey's stepmom. Foul play is suspected. Uncover a cast of characters, collect evidence, and find the truth in this first-person sci-fi mystery!

Forest Grove is a first-person mystery game where you uncover forensic clues, solve puzzles, and piece together a story using your own conclusions. Will you be able to solve the case?

Release Date is August 2021.

#madewithunity #indiegame #detective #scifi #adventuregame #mysterygame 

All characters appearing in this work are fictitious. Any resemblance to real persons, living or dead, is purely coincidental.
